name: Improved Devotion Aura
baseDescription: Increases the armor bonus of your Devotion Aura by 5%.

name: Redoubt
baseDescription: Increases your chance to block attacks with your shield by 6% after being the victim of a critical strike.  Lasts 10 sec or 5 blocks.

name: Precision
baseDescription: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 1%.

name: Guardian's Favor
baseDescription: Reduces the cooldown of your Blessing of Protection by 60 sec and increases the duration of your Blessing of Freedom by 3 sec.

name: Toughness
baseDescription: Increases your armor value from items by 2%.

name: Blessing of Kings
baseDescription: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, increasing total stats by 10% for 5 min.  Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

name: Improved Righteous Fury
baseDescription: Increases the amount of threat generated by your Righteous Fury spell by 16%.

name: Shield Specialization
baseDescription: Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 1% and has a 20% chance to generate 1 rage when a block occurs.

name: Improved Hammer of Justice
baseDescription: Decreases the cooldown of your Hammer of Justice spell by 5 sec.

name: Improved Concentration Aura
baseDescription: Increases the effect of your Concentration Aura by an additional 5% and gives all group members affected by the aura an additional 5% chance to resist Silence and Interrupt effects.

name: Blessing of Sanctuary
baseDescription: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, reducing damage dealt from all sources by up to 10 for 5 min.  In addition, when the target blocks a melee attack the attacker will take 14 Holy damage.  Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

name: Reckoning
baseDescription: Gives you a 20% chance to gain an extra attack after being the victim of a critical strike.

name: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
baseDescription: Increases the damage you deal with one-handed melee weapons by 2%.

name: Holy Shield
baseDescription: Increases chance to block by 30% for 10 sec, and deals 65 Holy damage for each attack blocked while active.  Damage caused by Holy Shield causes 20% additional threat.  Each block expends a charge.  4 charges.
